scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Presentation of Christ in the Temple. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue mantle and holding the Christ Child, stands on the left. To the right, a figure in priestly vestments, likely Simeon, receives the child and is about to wrap him in a cloth. Several onlookers, including a woman in an orange dress and men in various colored hats and robes, are present. The setting is an interior space with arched windows and columns, suggesting a religious building. A small dog is visible on the patterned floor.
